title: A couple of weeks ago I asked about the rat infestation on Figure Eight Island. I was given this information by one of Wilmington\'s most reputable exterminators. I never heard anything from you nor did I see any postings. Is this because of the political clout of F8 or are you holding info. or are F8 officials denying the allegation for PR purposes and the STAR is afraid to pursue it?
text:
We're still working on tracking down an answer for you. There was a
story in our paper back in the 80s about a similar problem, but in
fact, rats are not the uncommon anywhere around here. We'll try to
post a more detailed answer soon.
